update.foreach: into orders (order_no, menuno, u_username, cart_name, cart_price, cart_day, cart_count, image, cart_jumunMoney, s_num) values(#{item.orderNo}, #{item.menuno},#{item.uUsername}, #{item.cartName}, #{item.cartPrice}, sysdate, #{item.cartCount}, #{item.image}, #{item.cartJumunMoney}, #{item.sNum})
